column1: We don’t yet know how dangerous the new #coronavirus is – and we won’t know until more #data comes in. The 170 deaths out of 7,736 reported cases would mean a 2% mortality rate. #CoronavirusOutbreak

#CoronaVirus causes pneumonia. Those who have fallen ill are reported to suffer coughs, fever & breathing difficulties. Recovery depend on the strength of one’s immune system. Those who have died are known to have been already in poor health. #CoronavirusOutbreak

#CoronaVirus has come from animals. Many of those infected either worked in the #Huanan seafood wholesale market in the centre of the Chinese city, which also sold newly slaughtered animals. New & troubling viruses usually originate in animal hosts. Ebola and flu are examples.
#WHO declared #CoronavirusOutbreak a public health emergency. What is #Coronavirus? #Thread
